evidence.text:
SLATER KING: I Slater King would like to formally apologize for my behavior. I've sought therapy, and am taking a leave of absence from my company. I'm sorry.
INTERVIEWER: Right. Well lets get to question that everybody is dying for you to answer. Where have you been since you-
INTERVIEWER: I was going to say since you stepped down and made your CFO Vic Mahoney CEO of KING-tech.
INTERVIEWER: Right. So Last year you started the KING-TECH Foundation, in support of trauma survivors. What do you have to say to the people who called this performative?
